name: Dying Garden
description:
In Dying Garden the trees cant bear the background music. You play as Mr Grove's son, to save his farm and trees from disappearing by replanting more trees. You also get a secret ability to use, curious about it? Download the game now! The game is available officially for free on itch.io.

Minimum System Requirements required to run this game(compatible with Windows 10 64 bit only)
  • Processor: i3 9th gen
  • Ram: 4 GB DDR4 
  • Graphics : Nvidia GeForce GT series
Installation Guide: Extract the .rar files at your local file directory Open Dying-Garden-Game/Game/MusicGameJamGame.exe The game will start playing
